Class MessageStore<TMessage>

This class is used to store messages state.

Namespace: Hexalith.Application.StreamStores

Syntax
public class MessageStore<TMessage>
    where TMessage : IIdempotent
Type Parameters
Name Description
TMessage

The storage message type. Must have the JSON polymorphic base class attribute or one of it's base classes must have it.
